homepage.title: Empower Your Craft with AI
homepage.subtitle: Artisan is an educational platform providing intelligent tools to help you describe, narrate, and market your unique creations. Focus on your art, we'll help you master the business.
homepage.features_subtitle: From image to story, our AI is trained to help you showcase the soul of your work. Each feature is designed to teach you valuable skills for the digital marketplace.
homepage.feature_1_desc: Learn to write compelling marketing copy. Upload a photo and get an AI-generated description and tags to use as a starting point.
homepage.feature_2_desc: Master the art of narrative. Tell your product's story, and our AI will help you refine it into a captivating tale that connects with customers.
homepage.feature_3_desc: Get free, expert advice on marketing, pricing, and business strategy to grow your knowledge and confidence.
homepage.feature_4_desc: Spark your creativity. Generate innovative suggestions to modernize your products and expand your reach to new audiences.
homepage.art_title: A Platform to Learn and Grow
homepage.art_subtitle: Everything you need to master your art business and reach a wider audience.
homepage.overview_seller_1_desc: Practice creating beautiful product listings. Upload, categorize, and build showcases for your artwork in an intuitive dashboard.

homepage.overview_seller_3_desc: You're not alone. Join a vibrant community of fellow artisans to share ideas, collaborate, and grow together.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions.

items.question: Is the Artisan platform free to use for educational purposes?
items.answer: Yes, the Artisan platform is completely free for artisans to use as a learning and showcasing tool. There are no fees for using the AI features or listing your creations.

items.question: Can I actually sell products here?
items.answer: This version of the platform is designed for learning and showcasing your work. It helps you prepare for selling on other e-commerce sites but does not handle real transactions.

items.question: How do the AI tools work?
items.answer: Our AI tools are designed to be simple. For example, to generate a description, just upload a product image and click 'Generate'. The AI analyzes the image and creates a description and tags for you. You can then edit the text as you wish.

items.question: Can I interact with other artists?
items.answer: Yes! The 'Community Hub' is a place for you to connect with other artisans on the platform, share ideas, and collaborate.

items.question: Why do I need to verify my account to go live?
items.answer: We require verification for live streaming to ensure a safe and trusted environment for all users, including artists and learners. It helps prevent misuse and maintains the integrity of the platform.
